directions: Heat oil in a frying pan, sauté shallot, garlic, and ginger until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add red chili and fry until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Add minced beef, stir, and cook until no longer pink, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Season with Shaoxing wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt, sugar, and ground white pepper. Mix well.
Pour water and add green beans into the pan. Stir until well combine. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 3 to 4 minutes until green beans become tender but still crispy.
Add the corn starch solution and stir until the sauce thickens. Turn off heat and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 red chili (Indonesian: cabe merah besar), sliced diagonally
½ teaspoon ground white pepper (or ground black pepper)
350 gram green beans (Indonesian: buncis), trim ends and slice diagonally
corn starch solution (1/2 tablespoon corn starch + 1 tablespoon water)
title: Green Bean and Minced Beef Stir Fry
